column2:
lasso_preds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = pred, y = CPI))+
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.8, color = "darkred")+
  geom_abline(intercept = 0, 
              slope = 1, 
              size = 0.3, 
              linetype = "dashed", 
              alpha = 0.8, 
              color = "midnightblue")+
  theme_clean()+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent)+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent)+
  labs(x = "Model Prediction",
       y = "True Value",
       caption = "Source: TCMB")
